rows.label: tev069001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Go Sirho about Wrothian technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Go Sirho if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Go Sirho about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0001
rows.name:
I take pride in my work as a craftsmanâ€”though to be
certain, we do not possess "technologies" of the sort
that humans and Ma-non do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0002
rows.name:
And yet, in some respects, our weapons and Skells
surpass your own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0003
rows.name:
After all, we are mercenaries who feast upon the fruits
of our own fighting talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0004
rows.name:
We could not maintain our universal reputation as
skilled warriors if our weapons were lacking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0005
rows.name:
Our weapons were forged from the precious resources
of the Wrothian kingdom and honed by its master
craftsmen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0006
rows.name:
I hope that you will test the truth of my words by
wielding a Six Stars weapon yourself one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0011
rows.name: I craft the armaments used by our people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I still know too little about the ores and materials
available in these parts to work with them successfully.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0013
rows.name:
The only ones who know how to work these
materials are the Ma-non, it seems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perhaps I should waylay this Rutantan from the Candid
& Credible House of Fine Wares and beseech him to
teach me his technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0019
rows.name:
I have been traveling throughout Mira on my vigorous
Wrothian legs, planting data probes with care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Soon my efforts will be rewarded with the steady
supply of miranium I need to get my smithery on track.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0021
rows.name:
I could never have done this without you and Kirsty.
You have my thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0022
rows.name:
I must also extend my gratitude to Rutantan,
who instructed me in the arts of miranium crafting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev069001_MSG0023
rows.name:
I shall have to bring him a large quantity of miranium
as a token of my appreciation.[ST:wait ]
